page.title: 02NURSERY GARDENERS
page.content: There are two nurseries in the area- one on the outskirts of Thornwood and one near the M11 Roundabout at Hastingwood. High Elms Nursery is the larger, covering 8 hectares of flat land to the North of Thornwood.It is visible in the aerial view(photo 1). The owner and his family,who run the nursery, produce a wide range of bedding plants and flowers for sale to passers by, and also produce conifer trees. Canes Nursery,near Hastingwood, is also a family run business and while producing flowers and bedding plants,specialises in rose bushes.The large amounts of water needed for this nursery are obtained from a private borehole which takes water from beneath the roundabout.
